effect.ars_elemental.enderference.descri: 使目标无法传送或被传送
effect.ars_elemental.mana_shield.descrip: 使用魔力减轻受到的伤害，并增加不受负面效果影响的几率
effect.ars_elemental.static_charged.desc: 当持续时间结束时，召唤一道闪电击中受影响者
effect.ars_elemental.venom.description: 命中目标施加致命毒液，并受到毒孢子的更多伤害
ars_elemental.page2.flashing_archwood: 一种味道令人震惊的水果，用于酿造静电充能药水，causing a lightning to fall on the entity when the duration ends or allowing Discharge to hit. The energy stored in the fruit may cause whoever eats it to glow, get night vision, be shocked or charged with static energy.
ars_elemental.page.caster_bag: The trinket pouch can only hold rather small things, but with a stronger fiber it seems possible to hold different kind of magical items. The Spellcaster bag can hold any caster tool and the mod's magic armor, arrow and shield. You can also open it with $(k:ars_elemental.open_pouch) while in the hotbar or in a curio slot.
ars_elemental.page3.necrotic_focus: Summoned Wolves, Undead and Vexes seems unchanged at first, but if they die while the summoner wear this focus they will rise from death once, filled with blood lust. These undead summons will cast Homing spells when you do and heal you every time they kill an enemy.
ars_elemental.page.magma_upstream: This block generates an upstream current that will make surrounding entities in lava float upwards and gain a short Fire Resistance effect. Sneaking will allow to descend
ars_elemental.page.air_upstream: This block generates an upstream current that will make surrounding entities levitate. Sneaking will give Slowfall and allow to descend. Consumes Source when at least an entity is affected.
ars_elemental.page.everfull_urn: This magic urn converts Source into water. Link a cauldron or an Apothecary to the urn using a dominion wand and it will be refilled for a cheap amount of source.
ars_elemental.page1.advanced_prism: Upgrade of the Spell Prism that can be adjusted to aim to a specific block. Use the dominion wand to link the prism to a block. This prism also allows lenses, but can't be pushed by pistons.
ars_elemental.page2.advanced_prism: A 棱镜 can be applied to this advanced prisms to customize how the prism redirects projectiles. Arc and Homing lenses change the projectile to be an arc or homing projectile. Rainbow lens randomize the color of the projectile, while Acceleration and Deceleration lenses allow to adjust the speed.
ars_elemental.page.spell_mirror: Mirror similar to a Spell Prism that can be placed on walls, floor and ceiling. If a spell projectile hits the mirror, it will be reflected by with a mirrored angle.
ars_elemental.page.book_protection: This book upgrade will protect your spellbook from all kinds of damage, may it be a cactus or a pool of lava. Can't guarantee on the void. The gold inlays will become netherite-black but you can toggle it off in the client configs.
ars_elemental.perk_desc.thread_shock: Damaging effects cause the target to be shocked for a short duration before the effect resolves. Inflicts 静电充能d at tier 3.
ars_elemental.perk_desc.thread_spore: Damaging effects cause the target to be poisoned or hungry for a short duration before the effect resolves.
ars_elemental.perk_desc.thread_summon: Reduce Summon Sickness by 10%% for each tier. Starting from tier 2, it also slightly increase damage dealt by summoned creatures.
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_squirre: 将对角线为31格的立方体区域内的星宝石兽赋予长时间的速度提升效果。每30秒刷新一次效果，可使用金块将赋予效果的范围增加到对角线为61格的立方体范围
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_tesla_c: 对处于仪式区域的实体降下雷罚。如果要使玩家也受到雷罚，可以使用气之精华对其强化。[以仪式火盆为中心的11x7x11的立方体区域]
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_repulsi: 击退半径 15 个方块内的所有怪物。可以用骨头增强，只击退不死怪物。对玩家与Boss无效
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_attract: 让火盆像磁铁一样吸引半径为 8 个方块的实体。对玩家与Boss无效
ars_elemental.ritual_desc.ritual_detecti: 使128格方块范围内的所有怪物发光10分钟
ars_elemental.enchantment_desc.soulbound: 防止所附魔的物品在死亡时丢失
ars_elemental.familiar_desc.siren_famili: 塞壬会提升2点水元素学派魔符造成的伤害。当你处于水中时将被赋予海豚的恩惠II。在一只塞壬旁进行绑定仪式可获得该使魔
ars_elemental.familiar_desc.firenando_fa: 烈焰加农会提升2点火元素学派魔符造成的伤害，并减少20%%弹射物形态法术的消耗。对它喂食岩浆膏会获得短暂的抗火效果。在一只烈焰加农旁进行绑定仪式可获得该使魔
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_discharge: 释放受静电或电击影响的实体，对其造成伤害并电击周围的敌人。如果伤害是由静电触发的，则会增强伤害力。如果主要目标有能量型盔甲、其中的部分能量会被吸收，以提高伤害。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_spark: 用静电能量火花对目标造成伤害并将其震飞。对潮湿的实体造成更多伤害
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_bubble_sh: 制造一层消耗魔力的保护层，以减少受到的伤害。护盾还可以防止debuff对实体造成影响，如果在防御时法力耗尽，护盾也会消散。如果与水聚焦一起使用，还可以治疗地狱火灼伤
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_watery_gr: 该法术会令一个生物窒息而死。它会减少目标的氧气供应，使其在氧气耗尽后受到窒息伤害。当目标处于水中会加速下沉，该法术可被延长时效构件强化
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_conjure_t: 在目标处放置一块泥土。该法术可以被范围效果构件和穿透构件强化，从而放置更多方块。添加一个强化构件将会放置圆石；添加强化+熔炼构件将会放置石头；添加粉碎构件将会放置沙子；添加强化+粉碎构件将会放置砂岩
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_poison_sp: 令一个中毒或饥饿的目标身上爆发出剧毒孢子雾，处于孢子雾内的生物会沾染更强的中毒效果，该法术只能影响正在受中毒或饥饿效果影响的单位
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_phantom_g: 为亡灵回复少量生命值。对生物使用该法术时，会造成等量的魔法伤害和疲惫伤害，消耗其饱和度或饥饿值
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_spike: 制造一个滴石尖刺，对触碰到它的实体造成伤害。可以用 AoE 和 穿刺 强化，使其更宽或更高，用 延长时间 使其持续时间更长，或用 强化 使其造成更多伤害。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_envenom: 使目标中毒，并在一段时间内造成伤害。如果目标已经中毒，毒会变成更致命的毒液。中毒的目标会从毒孢子中受到更多伤害。
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_homing_pr: 该构件产生的弹射物将追踪周围的实体。如果没有可追踪的目标，它就会像一个普通弹射物一样发出。添加一个敏感构件可使其能追踪玩家
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_propagato: 在当前法术已结束后，将的剩余法术构件转化为追踪弹形态
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_arc_proje: 该法术形态会让弹射物受到重力影响，进行抛体运动。每增加一个穿透构件都会使抛射物在落地时弹射一次
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_propagato: 在当前法术已结束后，将的剩余法术构件转化为抛射物形态
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_aquatic_f: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets an aquatic creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_aquat: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets an aquatic creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_aerial_fi: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets an aerial creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_aeria: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets an aerial creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_fiery_fil: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a fire immune or fiery creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_fiery: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets a fire immune or fiery creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_insect_fi: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets an arthropod creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_insec: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets an arthropod creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_undead_fi: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets an undead creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_undea: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets an undead creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_summon_fi: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a summoned creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_not_summo: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets a summoned creature.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_life_link: 在你与目标的生命之间建立连接。施法者自身受到的伤害会与目标各承受一半，目标受到的治疗效果会与目标各承受一半
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_charm: 试着去支配敌人的思维，让他们在短时间内为你而战斗。你还可以用这个法术驯服那些可以被驯服的生物，例如狼。它甚至还能够让两只可以繁殖的动物坠入爱河。每增加一个强化构件或对怪物造成伤害，都可以让魅惑成功的概率得到提升，因为越强的怪物对于该魔符的抗性越强
ars_elemental.armor_set.shift_info: 长按 %s 查看套装属性
ars_elemental.lens.shift_info: 长按 %s 查看套装属性
ars_elemental.lens.arc: 将重定向弹射物转换为弧形弹射物
ars_elemental.lens.homing: 将重定向后的抛射物转换为追踪抛射物。原始弹射物的瞄准过滤器不会继承
ars_elemental.lens.rgb: 使重定向弹射物循环颜色
ars_elemental.lens.acceleration: 提高重定向弹射物的速度
ars_elemental.lens.deceleration: 降低重定向弹射物的速度
ars_elemental.lens.pierce: 如果提供魔源，可使重定向弹射物更具穿透力
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.wip: 提示：Since the Armor Rework requires a lot of assets work, the light and heavy elemental armors variants won't be ready for 1.19, so the 'medium' elemental armors can be crafted will all three types. Upgrading will keep enchants and threads, but requires the base armor to be at tier 3.
ars_elemental.armor_set.fire.desc: 吸收与火元素有关的伤害并转化为魔力，瞬间清除火焰
ars_elemental.armor_set.aqua.desc: 吸收与水元素有关的伤害并转化为魔力，如果即将溺水，则补充空气
ars_elemental.armor_set.earth.desc: 吸收与土元素有关的伤害并转化为魔力，如果即将饿死，可提供食物
ars_elemental.armor_set.air.desc: 吸收与气元素有关的伤害并转化为魔力，降低坠落伤害
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.fire: 与火之学派相契合、每件盔甲都会强化火系魔符，make them cheaper, and reduce damage related to fire, like lava, dragon breath and magma.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana and fire is immediately put out.
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.aqua: 与水之学派相契合、每件盔甲都会强化火系魔符，make them cheaper and reduce damage related to water, like drowning, freezing and lightning.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana and refill air if about to drown.
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.air: 与气之学派相契合、每件盔甲都会强化火系魔符，make them cheaper and reduce damage related to air, like falling, hitting walls while flying and lightning.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana, falling won't be a problem anymore!.
ars_elemental.page.armor_set.earth: 与土之学派相契合、每件盔甲都会强化火系魔符，make them cheaper and reduce damage related to earth, like starving, berry bushes, cactus and crushing.$(br)When all the pieces are equipped, the damage reduced is converted into mana and gives food deep underground if about to starve.
tooltip.siren_shards: 向海妖赠送海腌菜即可获得
ars_elemental.adv.title.curio_bag: 永远不要问法师包里有什么
ars_elemental.adv.desc.spore_blossom: 使用生长孢子或毒孢子击杀不死生物，获得孢子花
ars_elemental.adv.desc.mark_of_mastery: 将精华与供物结合，获得精通印记
ars_elemental.adv.desc.summon_dolphin: 使用召唤骏马召唤一只佩戴水之核心的海豚
ars_elemental.adv.desc.summon_strider: 使用召唤骏马召唤一只佩戴火之核心的炽足兽
ars_elemental.adv.desc.summon_skeleton_h: 使用召唤骏马召唤一只佩戴腐坏核心的骷髅马
ars_elemental.adv.desc.levitation: 佩戴气之核心时使用 发射 + 延长时间 让怪物浮空
ars_elemental.adv.desc.mirror_shield: 使用法术反射盾反射法术弹射物
